enhanced_by.reason: The add method modifies the queue state, which is relevant for the peek method to return a valid element.
The clear method resets the queue state, which is relevant for testing the peek method under an empty queue condition.
The remove method affects the queue state, which is relevant for testing the peek method after elements have been removed.
The size method provides information about the queue state, which is relevant for testing the peek method under different queue sizes.
